content: Your window is too small to display all page contents

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message when the window size is too small to display all page contents. It appears on the Breakpoint Warning component and is intended to inform users about this limitation. Translators should provide a clear and concise message that communicates this issue in various languages.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is technically correct but sounds awkward and unnatural in Azerbaijani. A more idiomatic way to express this would be to focus on the content being cut off rather than the window being too small.

The translation 'Ikkunasi on liian pieni näyttämään koko sivun sisällön' is a bit literal and sounds unnatural in Finnish. A more natural phrasing would express the idea that the window size prevents the content from being fully visible.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ikkunasi on liian pieni, ettei koko sivun sisältö mahdu näkyviin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and sounds unnatural in Armenian. A more natural phrasing would better convey the meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ձեր պատուհանը այնքան փոքր է, որ չի կարողացել ցուցադրել էջի բոլոր բովանդակությունը

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the phrase 'էջի բոլոր բովանդակությունը ցուցադրելու համար' is a bit clunky. It could be more concise.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ձեր պատուհանը այնքան փոքր է, որ չի կարողացել ցուցադրել էջի ամբողջությունը

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ウィンドウが小さいため、すべてのコンテンツが表示されない場合があります" is a bit too verbose and formal for a user-facing message in a settings panel. It uses "場合があります" (may not be displayed) which is less direct than needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ウィンドウが小さいため、コンテンツの一部が表示されないことがあります

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The suggestion above alters the nuance slightly. A more direct translation while retaining clarity could be considered.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ウィンドウが小さいため、コンテンツ全体を表示できません

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ໜ້າຈໍ' (screen) is correctly translated.
The word 'ເກີນໄປ' (too) is correctly translated.
The word 'ທີ່ຈະ' (to) is correctly translated.
The word 'ສະແດງ' (display) is correctly translated.
The word 'ເນື້ອຫາໜ້າທັງໝົດ' (all page contents) is correctly translated.
The sentence structure is grammatically correct and flows naturally in Lao.

While the translation is accurate, it could be slightly more concise.  'Your window is too small to display all page contents' implies a restriction on the browser window itself. The Lao translation is more generic about 'screen'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໜ້າຈໍຂອງທ່ານນ້ອຍເກີນໄປທີ່ຈະເບິ່ງເນື້ອຫາໜ້າທັງໝົດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "සියළුම පිටුවල අන්තර්ගත පෙන්වීමට ඔබගේ කවුළුව ඉතා කුඩාය" is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Sinhala. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබේ කවුළුව ඉතා කුඩා නිසා පිටුවල සියළුම අන්තර්ගත පෙන්විය නොහැක (Obae kawuluva athi kude nae piwela siyaluya anthargatha penviya nahake)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word order in the translation is slightly awkward. Sinhala typically places the subject before the verb.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: See suggestion above for corrected phrasing.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ваш прозор је превише мали да прикаже сав садржај страница' is a literal translation and doesn't convey the intended meaning clearly in Serbian. 'Prozor' directly translates to 'window,' which is not the relevant component here. The intended meaning is about the browser viewport or screen size.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ваш екран је премали за приказивање свих садржаја странице.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the translation uses a more formal tone than might be appropriate for settings text. Consider a more conversational approach.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ваш екран је мали за приказивање свих садржаја странице.
